column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I wish I could give this place NO STARS!! Worst pizza ever! Kate messed up our order so bad. 9 ppl in our party
column2: she was given 5 cards to charge evenly. She charged the first 3 cards 3 times. How the hell does that happen?!?! Cheese and meats on pizza tasted like really low quality. Save yourself some time and hype and go to PEQUOD'S!
